scripts.test: node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma.conf.js && npm run thirdparty
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && echo > test/z-ensure-coverage.js; find src -type f -name '*.js' -print0 | xargs -0 -I '{}' echo 'require("../{}");' | egrep -v "(jetpack|main.js)" >> test/z-ensure-coverage.js
scripts.precompile: command rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy && node scripts/all-locales.js
scripts.postcompile: node scripts/copy-built-international-sites.js && cp scripts/s3_base/index.html deploy/index.html && cp scripts/s3_base/index.html deploy/error.html
scripts.demo: npm run compile && npm test && coverage/unit/*/index.html # open a repar in a safe way too?
